Class Tree

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Tree
extends java.awt.geom.Ellipse2D.Double
    A Tree object that is represented by an Ellipse2D.Double
    Version:
    April 30, 2015
    Author:
    Humaira Orchee, Charlotte Dye, and Sehr Sethi
    See Also:

        Constructs a circular tree

        centerX - The x coordinate of the center of the tree

        fillColor - The fill color of the tree

      • containedWithin

        public boolean containedWithin(Tree otherTree)
        Returns true if this tree is contained within another tree. Otherwise returns false.
        Parameters:
        otherTree - The other Tree object that might contain this tree
        Returns:
        True if this tree is contained within another tree. Otherwise returns false.

      • checkOverlap

        public boolean checkOverlap(Tree otherTree)
        Returns true if this tree has unacceptable amount of overlap. Otherwise returns false.
        Parameters:
        otherTree - The other Tree object that could be overlapping too much
        Returns:
        True if there's an unacceptable overlap, or false otherwise
